tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    score INT,
    level INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE leaderboard (
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    rank INT,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    score INT,
    level INT,
    CONSTRAINT pk_player_stats PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_player_id FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_game_id FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE leaderboard_scores (
    leaderboard_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    score INT,
    rank INT,
    CONSTRAINT pk_leaderboard_scores PRIMARY KEY (leaderboard_id, player_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_leaderboard_id FOREIGN KEY (leaderboard_id) REFERENCES leaderboards(leaderboard_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_player_id_scores FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);
